bug.short_desc: Generator should warn when an Environment variable is set in Config that is not used in Code

long_desc.thetext:
The bug subject and its description are a bit ambiguous, but I take it to mean environment keys that are defined in the configuration of a job, but are not queried in any of the classes of the application (I've edited the subject to that end). Is that right?!
As for wording: If an environment key and value are given in the job configuration, this key *is* "defined", in my view of the world.
Move open issues to RESOLVED â€“ LATER, whose last comment is older than a year.
